name: Deluxe Logo Blue
description:
Every T-Shirt you buy, We donate all the profits towards supporting our network of incredible artists that we sponsor through Pyramid Affiliate Records.

All T-Shirts arrive usually within 7 days of ordering when shipping address is within the UK mainland. Orders typically take between 7-10 days if shipping internationally. 

All products are made to order so that we can put more money into supporting our artists.

Support great artists today and make a difference.

Sizing:

S - 34/36" 
M - 38/40" 
L - 42/44" 
XL - 46/48" 
2XL - 50/52"

Check us out on facebook: www.facebook.com/PyramidCo.Apparel

LOVE.MUSUC.LIVE
